ticket_text: I received a damaged phone in my last order (#78901). I need a replacement as soon as possible.
I'm unable to access my account even after resetting my password. Please help!
I want to know if the new laptop model is available for pre-order. Any information would be helpful.
The payment for my last purchase didn't go through but the amount was deducted from my bank account. Can you check?
My smart TV is not connecting to Wi-Fi after the latest software update. Can you assist me with troubleshooting?
